org.sadun.util.io
Class ForEachLine

java.lang.Object
  org.sadun.util.io.ForEachLine
public class ForEachLine
extends java.lang.Object

This class executes an actionfor every line in a text file, possibly matching a condition.

Author:
Cristiano Sadun

condition - the condition that must hold on the line

public ConditionException getConditionException(int lineNumber)
Return the exception that was raised by evaluating the condition at the given line number, or null if no exception exists for that line (after a process() operation).
